name: tail-slap
flavor_text: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.
effect_text_extend:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2â€“5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
